memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_operation transA, rocblas_operation transB, rocblas_int m, rocblas_int n, const float *alpha, const float *A, rocblas_int lda, const float *beta, const float *B, rocblas_int ldb, float *C, rocblas_int ldc)
memberdef.name: rocblas_sgeam

detaileddescription.para: xGEAM performs one of the matrix-matrix operations C = alpha*op( A ) + beta*op( B ),
where op( X ) is one of op( X ) = X or op( X ) = X**T or op( X ) = X**H,
alpha and beta are scalars, and A, B and C are matrices, with op( A ) an m by n matrix, op( B ) an m by n matrix, and C an m by n matrix.

parameterdescription.para: rocblas_handle. handle to the rocblas library context queue.
rocblas_operation specifies the form of op( A )
rocblas_operation specifies the form of op( B )
pointer storing matrix A on the GPU.
rocblas_int specifies the leading dimension of A.
pointer storing matrix B on the GPU.
rocblas_int specifies the leading dimension of B.
pointer storing matrix C on the GPU.
rocblas_int specifies the leading dimension of C.

memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_operation transA, rocblas_operation transB, rocblas_int m, rocblas_int n, const double *alpha, const double *A, rocblas_int lda, const double *beta, const double *B, rocblas_int ldb, double *C, rocblas_int ldc)
memberdef.name: rocblas_dgeam
